bot_description:
🌟Welcome to the TonPass Bot!🌟

We're glad to have you here! 😊
TonPass provides instant and secure SMS activation services
for all your online verification needs. 🌐

Ready to get started? Simply choose an option below and experience
smooth, reliable SMS verifications.

🔥 Fast, simple, and efficient! 🔥
bot_markdown_description:
🌟*Welcome to the TonPass Bot\!*🌟

We're glad to have you here\! 😊
TonPass provides *instant and secure* SMS activation services
for all your online verification needs\. 🌐

Ready to get started? Simply choose an option below and experience
smooth, reliable SMS verifications\.

🔥 *Fast, simple, and efficient\!* 🔥
help_cmd_short_description_cmd_markdown: Provides instructions for interacting with the bot
short_description_markdown: Easily obtain *SMS activation codes* for various online services\. Simply request a code for services like Google\, Instagram\, and Facebook\, and quickly and efficiently receive your verification SMS\.
help_cmd_text_markdown:
This bot allows you to easily send SMS activation codes to verify accounts for popular online services\.

 📋 Available commands:
/start – Start interacting with the bot
unknown_cmd_text_markdown:
Unsupported command

Sorry\, the command you entered is not recognized\. Please ensure you are using one of the supported commands\. Type /help to view the list of available commands and their usage\.

choose_language_markdown.one:
Current Language: *{{ .Language }}*
Would you like to change the language\? Choose an option below
choose_language_markdown.other:
Current Language: *{{ .Language }}*
Would you like to change the language\? Choose an option below

select_sms_service_markdown:
We offer various online services\.
 Please select the one you’d like to activate via SMS\.
select_sms_service_with_country_markdown: Select the country whose numbers you want to use:

enter_amount_for_payment_in_currency_mar.description: Enter the amount for payment in currency
enter_amount_for_payment_in_currency_mar.one: Enter the amount for payment in *{{ .Currency }}*
enter_amount_for_payment_in_currency_mar.other: Enter the amount for payment in *{{ .Currency }}*

enter_amount_for_payment_in_currency_err.description: Please enter the amount in currency using the correct number format
enter_amount_for_payment_in_currency_err.one:
Please enter the amount in *{{ .Currency }}* using the correct number format\.

 Examples: *12\.30, 12, 100, etc*\.
enter_amount_for_payment_in_currency_err.other:
Please enter the amount in *{{ .Currency }}* using the correct number format\.

 Examples: *12\.30, 12, 100, etc*\.

crypto_bot_pay_title_markdown: Tap *'Pay'* to make the payment, or *'Cancel'* if you wish to delete the invoice\.
balance_updated_markdown:
💳 *Your account balance has been updated*\!

🙏 Thank you for using our service\!

choose_preferred_currency_markdown.one:
Preferred Currency: *{{ .Currency }}*
If you'd like to switch, please choose an option below
choose_preferred_currency_markdown.other:
Preferred Currency: *{{ .Currency }}*
If you'd like to switch, please choose an option below

success_received_sms_code_title_markdown: Your SMS activation code has been received\!
success_received_sms_code_footer_markdow:
Please use the *SMS code* to complete your registration.

Thank you for using our service\!
start_sms_activation_title_markdown:
You can start the registration process now\.
Please wait for the *SMS code*\. We'll notify you as soon as it arrives\. If the code does not arrive within *20 minutes*\, the money will automatically be returned to your balance\.
numbers_are_unavailable_markdown: Sorry, it looks like the numbers are unavailable right now\. Please try again
fail_to_order_sms_code_markdown: There was an issue with order SMS code. Please try again\.
internal_error_markdown: An internal error occurred\. Please try again later\.
not_receive_sms_code_title_markdown: Unfortunately, we did not receive *the sms code*
not_receive_sms_code_footer_markdown: As a result, we have refunded *the full amount*\. *Please try again*, and if the issue persists, feel free to contact our support team\. We apologize for the inconvenience

subscribe_to_channel_markdown.description: Tap the link below to subscribe to our Telegram channel
subscribe_to_channel_markdown.one: Want to keep using the bot? Subscribe to our *{{ .Channel }}* Telegram channel for instant updates and important announcements\! Subscribe Now
subscribe_to_channel_markdown.other: Want to keep using the bot? Subscribe to our *{{ .Channel }}* Telegram channel for instant updates and important announcements\! Subscribe Now

cancel_sms_activation_footer_markdown: We've processed your refund and the amount has been returned to your account

success_deleted_invoice_markdown.description: Your invoice has been successfully deleted
success_deleted_invoice_markdown.one: *Your invoice was deleted successfully*\. Feel free to create a new one anytime
success_deleted_invoice_markdown.other: *Your invoice was deleted successfully*\. Feel free to create a new one anytime

success_cancel_pay_service_markdown: You have *successfully* declined the SMS service payment
choose_payment_method_markdown: Choose *a payment method* to top up your balance
invoice_telegram_stars_description: Tap "Pay" to top up your balance, or "Cancel" if you do not want to proceed
